column1: Data Supplied By: National Livestock Reporting Service
Data source: National Livestock Reporting Service
Please see terms of use here: https://www.mla.com.au/general/Terms-and-conditions/data-and-information/

Numbers reduced by 820 head penning 214 very mixed cattle at Inverell. Trends varied with processors and restockers strong on light heifers. Not all buyers attended.

Weaner steers up 8c/kg to restockers and the heifer portion considerably  dearer to backgrounder competition. Processor heifers lifted 11c/kg . Yearling steers to the paddock slipped 3c/kg topping at 334c/kg and medium feeders also significantly cheaper owing to less numbers and a quality correction. 

There were no numbers of grown steers or heifers for a reliable quote. Medium cows marginally dearer making to 187c/kg . Heavy weight cows slipped 8c/kg  selling 185 to 229c/kg. The bull market topped at 232c/kg .

Stephen Adams MLA
